translation.Message_0_Page_0: Alrighty.. that last mission was a great success. I'm surprised you managed to make it out alive.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I think you are finally worthy of accompanying me in something bigger.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Traveller, this will be our last operation against the penguins.
translation.Message_0_Page_4: They have been secretly reverse engineering a tank they stole from the military...<pause> apparently they towed it with a tractor.
translation.Message_0_Page_6: According to my intelligence they already have one example built alongside the one they stole.
translation.Message_0_Page_7: We must destroy them, <name_char>.<pause> Come with me.
